name: Dum Noitcelloc
description:
Dum Noitcelloc: The Game

Go only in REVERSE!

By Ansh Chablani | Roll No. 2022111031

INSTRUCTIONS

 * Get as much mud as possible in 20 seconds. Mud is collected when it falls inside the claw.

 * You should only move the JCB in reverse, that is to the right in this frame.

 * Moving it in forward direction will add to the penalty.

 * The total points after the end of the time would be:

 * (Mud Collected * 100 - Penalty)

 * ### The JCB comes back from the other side after it gets out of the frame

CONTROLS

  * Left and Right Arrow Keys to move.

  * W & S to move arm UP and DOWN

  * A & D to rotate the claw.
